alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 10:20PM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and freezing fog will cause slippery roads conditions during the overnight hours. A burst of light snow and falling temperatures early Friday morning may cause additional slick spots to develop. * WHERE...All of western Kentucky, Mississippi and New Madrid Counties in southeast Missouri, and Warrick and Spencer Counties in southwest Indiana. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Untreated secondary roads and bridges as well as parking lots and sidewalks will be most susceptible to icing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
